recipe.title: Summer Quiche
recipe.step: Prepare large pie dish by greasing with a bit of oil or butter and set aside.
Slice the sweet potatoes with a mandolin or peeler into very thin slices.
Place in a bowl with the olive oil and seasoning with salt and pepper.
Toss with your hands until all slices are coated.
Place a layer of the potatoes slices covering the enter pie dish, then continue another layer until all pieces are used.
Ideally you want at least 2-3 layers thick.
Place in over for 15 minutes and remove to cool.
Meanwhile beat eggs and cream with a whisk.
Mix up the other veggies except the tomatoes.
Season with salt and pepper and pour into pie crust.
Place tomatoes on top and bake until centre cooked, about 30-40 minutes.
Serve hot or cold with a side of salad.
You can mix up the veggies to whatever you like or have in the fridge. You can also swap out the sweet potatoes for regular potatoes.
